definition: tight/strict/close at hand/near/urgent/tense/hard up/short of money/to tighten
to close/to stop up/to shut/to obstruct

sentences.english: His lips are tight; his jaw is clenched.
He lacdfds. com on his back, his teeth set, his right hand clenched on his breast.
sentences.chinese: 他仰臥着，牙關緊閉，右手緊握着拳頭胸口上。

sentences.english: The door was closed, so he knocked, but there was no answer.
sentences.chinese: 門緊閉着，他敲一下門，裏面沒有迴應。

sentences.english: Long to set out the next day, but the wangs are closed.
sentences.chinese: 第二天長文來迎親，但王家大門緊閉。

sentences.english: She never did open her eyes.
sentences.chinese: 她雙眼緊閉，從這以後就再也未睜開過雙眼。

sentences.english: While the front door is closed,there must be another open for you.
sentences.chinese: 當你的大門緊閉時，另一扇大門就一定會爲你敞開。

sentences.english: I felt my jaws clench and teeth grind together.
sentences.chinese: 我感到雙顎緊閉，牙齒緊緊咬在一起。

sentences.english: He lay on the sleeping-porch and watched the winter sun slide along the taut curtains.
sentences.chinese: 他躺在迴廊裏，看冬天的陽光滑過緊閉的窗簾。

sentences.english: Two closely shut old gates just like the vicissitude of a family.
sentences.chinese: 緊閉着的兩扇老門，象關着一個家族的變遷史。

sentences.english: He clinched his hands. He knitted his brows and tightened his lips.
sentences.chinese: 他雙手握拳，雙眉緊蹙，嘴脣緊閉。

sentences.english: As the rolle coaster started to move, Tommy squeezed his eyes shut.
sentences.chinese: 雲霄飛車啓動時，湯米把眼睛緊緊閉上。

sentences.english: He shutteth his eyes to devise froward things: moving his lips he bringeth evil to pass.
sentences.chinese: 眼目緊合的，圖謀乖僻，嘴脣緊閉的，成就邪惡。

sentences.english: The mouth is reversed into a frown but is still closed.
sentences.chinese: 嘴巴已經緊蹙地反過來，但還使緊閉着。

sentences.english: Outside, even through the shut window-pane, the world looked cold.
sentences.chinese: 即使透過緊閉的窗格，外面的世界也看起來一片冰冷。

sentences.english: He lay on his back, his teeth set, his right hand clenched on his breast .
sentences.chinese: 他仰臥着，牙關緊閉，右手緊握着拳頭放在胸口上。

sentences.english: You say that you love the wind, but you close the windows when it blows.
sentences.chinese: 你說你愛微風輕柔，風拂髮梢時你卻緊閉門窗。
